body_html:
it looks like a mentor can fav an application without signing it off.

Hah, yes. I've noticed that after I've uploaded the screenies. I wouldn't enforce it and rely on some common sense (famous last words… 🙃). Not having signed-off an application will rule it out anyway. Otoh, it's not too difficult to implement, but I won't have time for that until tomorrow evening. If we want that extra check, we should probably still merge first and then add it later. Would you like to send a PR for it? 😉

Related: you could also fav all your teams which doesn't make any sense at all.

body:
>  it looks like a mentor can fav an application without signing it off.

Hah, yes. I've noticed that after I've uploaded the screenies. I wouldn't enforce it and rely on some common sense (famous last words… 🙃). Not having signed-off an application will rule it out anyway. Otoh, it's not too difficult to implement, but I won't have time for that until tomorrow evening. If we want that extra check, we should probably still merge first and then add it later. Would you like to send a PR for it? 😉 

Related: you could also fav *all* your teams which doesn't make any sense at all.
